original_title: Sri Lanka rupee close at 320.00/50 to the US dollar, bond yields down
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed at 320.00/320.50 to the US dollar on Tuesday, dealers said.
The rupee closed at 321.00/323.00 to the US dollar on Monday.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 closed down at 13.05/15 after closing on Monday at 13.20/40 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2028 closed down at 13.30/45 after closing at 13.40/60 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 closed down at 14.25/35 after closing at 14.35/40 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 closed down at 14.40/55 percent up from closing at 14.55/70 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 closed stable at 15.90/16.00 percent after closing at 15.90/16.05 percent. (Colombo/Aug08/2023)
